game.name: Puppet Soccer Champions
game.description:
Among the game of soccer online, you therefore require to play it in a unique and interesting manner by kicking it all around and in an interesting manner. The movements in this game are being like puppet makes them to be more sober and crazy one to play and get into indulged with in an interesting manner.

In the game, there are total 32 teams divided into eight groups. You could be a part of any of the eight groups selecting the team of your preference and choice. You will have to win all your group games to make an entry into pre-quarter finals.

After winning all the two rounds of pre-quarterfinals, next you have been set for quarter finals. In a same manner, you will have to reach till finals winning quarterfinals as well as semi finals for two round of each game. In final, you win a gold medal and even loosing the gold medal, you further are required to fight for the silver medal as well too. Meanwhile, in the game winning gold medal helps at the next level of the game to assure better characters and puppets to be upgraded.

For the control and moving around puppets in this soccer games for free use arrow keys for the movement and space bar for giving a flight to the ball in the air.
game.metaTitle: Puppet Soccer Champions, Soccer  Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Puppet Soccer Champions is the most inviting and challenging online soccer game that is required to play the game in an interesting and unique way to be enjoyed and preferred by you.
